nodes.text: Eanca Goa-Ato, also known as the Grand Protector's Hunters' Guild Hall, was located in the Rodian city of Iskaayuma on Rodia. A large complex of buildings, the Eanca Goa-Ato contained the offices of the Goa-Ato. The complex also housed the Grand Protector's Chambers, the Awards Hall, and the Chronicle Room containing records of the hunts of Goa-Ato members. The Eanca Goa-Ato hosted the annual Rodian hunting awards, the Atiang.
